projects.overall: Build a system which generates high-quality headshot images from input face images using some SOTA text-to-image generation models.

projects.projectName: Auto Review system for Photo, Footage and Illustration data.
projects.overall: Build a system which operates upto 15 AI models to handle vast of Computer vision problems, in order to automate Photo, Footage and Illustration reviewing process. Deploy the system and optimize running performance.
Research and understand some SOTA text-to-image generation models.
Understand and propose a set of criterias for objective image aesthetics assessment. Research and build a model to rank a list of images base on aesthetics aspects.
Deploy and monitor computer vision models as a service. Present and discuss with customer about the product

projects.projectName: Face recognition and face attributes classification
projects.overall: Build face verification model and face analysis model which handles some attributes such as emotion, age, gender, race, hair, accessories â€¦
Build a solution to detect tiny face (~20 pixel) on super-high-resolution image (~6000 - ~8000 pixel).
Build a model to extract features from a video and summarize a long list of tags which describe the video into a shorter list.

projects.projectName: High resolution image synthesis and translation using GANs
projects.overall: Generate and control high resolution image generation from noise vector or from a given input image.
Introduce basic Python programming like data types, control flow, functions, and some libraries like Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-learn for data analytics.
Introduce machine learning ideas and classic algorithms: supervised and un-supervised learning, gradient descent. Train and evaluate machine learning models using Scikit-learn.
Review basic math knowledge about linear algebra, calculus, probability and statistics for data analyst and machine learning.

Introduce simple deep learning models for each type of data: tabular data, computer vision, NLP, computer audition, time series. Introduce some other techniques likes reinforcement leanring, semi/self-supervised learning, model compression.

projects.projectName: Course: Basic Data Lake with Hadoop
projects.overall: Introduce some basic definition in big data and build some demos using Hadoop ecosystem: HDFS, Map-Reduce, YARN, Spark, Kafka.
Introduce basic PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning syntax to build Dataset, DataLoader, Model, API and use some model compression techniques.
Introduce vast of Computer Vision problems and models: classification, object detection, image segmentation, face ecosystem, contrastive learning, video processing.
Introduce basic Python programming like data types, control flow, functions, and some libraries like Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn for data analytics.
Introduce machine learning ideas and classic algorithms: supervised and un-supervised learning. Train and evaluate machine learning models using Scikit-learn.
